asyncExecute

public static void asyncExecute(String[] command,
                                Map<String,String> envMap,
                                File path)
Executes the given command in the background. This does not show the script output because this would sync the child thread with ours.

Parameters:
command -

displayFile

public static boolean displayFile(String filePath)
Give it a file and it will display all of its contents on the screen. Good for showing text files such as help files.

Parameters:

getRegExprMatchLine

public static String getRegExprMatchLine(String fileName,
                                         String regExpr)
Reads through a file and returns the first line that matches the given regular expression. Note that it is a regular expression match and the match is for the whole line.

Parameters:
fileName - The file to read.
regExpr - The regular expression to be matched.
Returns:
The line that matches the given regular expression.

getMatchLine

public static String getMatchLine(String fileName,
                                  String[] matchStrings)
Reads through a file and if a line in the file contains all the strings specified, returns the first such line.

Parameters:
fileName - The file to read.
matchStrings - The array of strings to be searched.
Returns:
The line matching all the given strings.
